name: io.github.SEOLinkMap/seolinkmap
description: SEOLinkMap MCP server providing SERP-specific statistical SEO analysis, competitor research, and interactive site architecture visualization. Access SEO documentation, create accounts, and explore demo SERP correlation data with academic-level statistical rigor.

remotes.description: Server-Sent Events transport for older MCP protocol versions
Streamable HTTP transport for modern MCP protocol versions
